title: Nonbank Financial Intermediation, Financial Stability, and the Road Forward
content: For release on delivery  7:15 p.m. EDT   March 30, 2015      Nonbank Financial Intermediation, Financial Stability, and the Road Forward         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at      “Central Banking in the Shadows:  Monetary Policy and Financial Stability Postcrisis”  20th Annual Financial Markets Conference   sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta     Stone Mountain, Georgia                 March 30, 2015
